titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the Generall Assembly at Glascoe in the kingdome of Scotland, the tenth day of Iune, 1610. By George Meriton Doctor of Diuinitie, and one of his Maiesties chaplaines
titleStmt.author: Meriton, George, d. 1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Stansby for Henry Featherstone,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
